name: Drift The Dishes
description:
Drift The Dishes

Drift through the streets as rush to complete all your food deliveries without totalling your car.  Drift The Dishes was developed for the Ohana Community Summer Jam 2021. The theme of the jam was Food Chain so we created a top-down racing game where you play as a food delivery driver who has to make his deliveries as fast as possible. 

We recommend downloading the Windows version of our game, if you can, for the optimal experience.

Credits
  • Arya Vatan-Abadi - Developer / Game Designer
  • Sarin Shrestha - Developer / Game Designer
  • Xander de Beer - Sound Designer / Game Designer
